website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced two-tier console table in colors to fit different decor.
pros: Attractive space-saving model with a wood-look finish that comes in choice of several colors
Metal accents and hardware compliment the design
Measures 46 inches wide by 14 inches deep by 30 inches high
cons: Material is laminated and not real hard wood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: The screws all go In at an a slant. Where the screws are suppose to go, you have to make a hole for them first it tells you to use a normal screw driver, I would use an electircal one. The bolts are to buy my for the screws. All and all not happy about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Build (Holes were not drilled)
customer_reviews.text: The holes are not drilled all the way through, so building it was quite complicated. The holes where nails were supposed to go were only marked, not actually drilled.
customer_reviews.author: NKAZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better in person and was a great addition to my livingroom
customer_reviews.author: The Liberian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great entry way table. Sturdy. Great price for comparable products
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality look nice ,, the price is little high not very big look smaller then the picture
customer_reviews.author: Brololo

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Very thin, very thin lamination!
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced, should be a 50$ table. Spun it around on the floor, upside down, while I was assembling the d*** thing...it scratched. Wouldn't buy again, but will be using coasters. Very cheap, thin laminate. DO NOT BUY, WILL NOT LAST LONG!!! Solid construction, thus far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I have the matching end tables & tv stand, & all of them have impressed me greatly. They all have a decent weight to them, making them very sturdy. They aren’t cheap at all. I’m so happy with my purchase, & the color is great. (Grey Wash)
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Figured I’d need a little something for my entryway and thought this was the perfect fit. I ordered on March 29th and received the entryway table packaged perfectly on the 3rd of April. Easy to assemble and comes with very simple instructions. Only had one imperfection that is towards the back so it’s easily hidden. Other than that I absolutely love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great coffee table, sturdy and stylish. The prices in this set are a little pricy but worth it as they all match each other and add a great vibe to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Warped top beware! 😠
customer_reviews.text: Warped top - verified with a level pics included. My wife is pissed, after watching me putting it together successfully; only to discover the top is warped! Yes I used a level. WTF storage climate? IDK but only shipped from 2 states East of me. Not good, or convenient to have to tear apart get a new piece see if it's level oh and there's glue involved in putting the top on so... 😞 Front and back show same bowing / warping. It's level in center sides are bowed as indicated by the level. 😠
customer_reviews.author: neofirebird

customer_reviews.title: Pipe Clamps and Patience
customer_reviews.text: I’m an experienced woodworker for nearly 45 years. That said, this item would be easier to build from a pile of wood than it was to assemble from the manufacturer. The instructions (which I rarely follow) were very simple to understand and follow, but some of the pre-drilled holes for cam bolts and wooden dowels didn’t line up. Nor did the holes for the hinges. The finished product is satisfactory for my purposes, but I would recommend paying the extra assembly fee if you purchase this unit. Unless you have pipe clamps and a lot of patience.
customer_reviews.author: 52 carp

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Don’t spend your money
customer_reviews.text: Awful piece of furniture! Wish i would have just gone to ikea. Have to assemble all of it, and the screw holes aren’t cut large enough for them to fit. Wobbles once assembled. Wish i never would have bought. Won’t buy from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This console table was exactly what I pictured for my home. When I initially took it out of the box I was a little disappointed because it seemed like it would be tiny but it's actually perfect. It is the perfect size height, width, and length and I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and looks exactly like the picture. It’s pretty sturdy, but there’s room for improvement. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennhuiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVED LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and unharmed! Easy assembly too! It was just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: melanie cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Sad for my room
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice was easy to put together. Nothing lined up. Had you use a ratchet strap to try and get the very end post(in pic) to seat into the junky post lock . Male to female type of locking mechanism. Super wobbly. Looks bowed before adding the home theater equipment. Used a gift card to buys this or would have returned. Which would have been a pain as the box had some big rips. No damage to product though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and I have no complaints about how sturdy it is. Provides a great thing to stuff full of baby junk and put a light on in the living room. Compared to other furniture you would assemble yourself that you would buy from amazon or ikea this is pretty good quality. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick&SamanthaW.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Highly recommend and would buy again. I put it together all by myself and it seems really sturdy. Very well packaged. I got the white wash color and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: IApeeps

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Much like the matching entertainment center, this unit came with a lot of pieces. It took me awhile to assemble and I needed my husband's help for some of the screws and to fit some pieces together. I love the look of the coffee table. It hides fingerprints and kid smudges pretty well. It also stands up to the kid's daily abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very clean, very pretty table!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a coffee table and finally came across this one! Super easy to assemble! (Only took me 40 min by myself!) It came very well packaged and protected. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Use a Drill
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were cheaply made so assembly was far more difficult than necessary. It says you shouldn’t use a drill. However, on some legs, there are no holes and I don’t have the strength to screw a hole into the “wood” with just a screw driver. Using the drill was ENORMOUSLY helpful. The metal “X”s that go on the sides are not sized properly as they don’t line up with the “holes” which would be better described as “markings” making the drill even more necessary. After about an hour, it was together and it is aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just got this last night and it is just what I was looking for! Goes great with our tv stand! It was super easy to set up! Is very sturdy! It was a little smaller than I initially thought but it’s perfect because it doesn’t take up to much of the living room space!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have kids- cheap laminate surface
customer_reviews.text: The look of the table is great. It is not good for long term, especially if you have kids. The laminate is super cheap and peels easily. We had guests who didn't use coasters for their drinks and now the surface looks like crap. Like other reviews have said, PLEASE save your money and put it toward a better quality purchase. Especially if you have kids or guests.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Woofy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Decent table for the price. Cons: many chipped and peeling areas, under the table top glued areas that were already defective & stripped hardware. Overall, this is just something to hold us over until we buy what we like but I don’t recommend for those that are purchasing for long-term. Save your money for better quality furniture if that’s the case. However, the matching side table I bought was in much better condition. No chips or defects.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a familiar review for the other table I ordered at the same time except this one arrived with two scratches on top. I emailed the manufacturer to see what they can do for me. I’ll hate to repackage the item and carry it to the nearest UPS store. Lets see what they say.
customer_reviews.author: 2fastandfurious

customer_reviews.title: Poor Laminate materials
customer_reviews.text: Item chip after one week of having it. Cheap laminate materials. Save your money and buy something of better quality
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my living room and I love the bottom shelf. It matches the entertainment center from the same collection perfectly. The only problem is that it seems a little more wobbly than I expected despite ensuring all the screws were in tight enough and all the pieces were together right. It isn't about to collapse or anything, but I need to be really careful moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why so short?
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is missing an entire foot in length. It’s so short. I laughed hysterically when my 6’6 hubby put it together and carried it like a kids table to our living room. Who designed this? Add another foots length or more and it would be perfect. We crack up every time we go into the living room and see it. We decided to keep it for our future children to use as a craft table.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Covel

customer_reviews.title: We probably were part of the rare few that got a defective set.
customer_reviews.text: We had to return the product since the pieces didn’t fit together right. Probably was warped or defective. Customer service from Walker Edison was good. My talk to text dropped an F bomb on accident during the chat, and the rep was very understanding. Amazon had UPS pick up the products (we had bought a matching item) from our porch no charge. Can’t really complain given the process was not bad, except for assembly stress with the husband. We ended up going with a different product, so I didn’t rate durability.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this console table!!!! The grey wash color looks so good and goes with so much! The table is very sturdy. Packaged well with no damages. It took about 45mins or so to put together but I wouldn’t say it was difficult. I felt directions were easy to follow. I think this table is a great value! Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KG2004

customer_reviews.title: Cute little table
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our living room and have been looking for new furniture. I found this and a tv stand that matches it and ordered both. It showed up in 2 days and my husband put it together in about an hour. It looks great and feels sturdy! It is against a wall between our front door and couch. I plan to use it as decoration and to put cups on while sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of good reviews for this table, so I gave it a try, but I regret I did.. This table looks very nice, however it's is a terrible quality table. It's very unstable and wabbles so much. My husband had a very nice TV stand from this company before, so I was very excited to have this table, but I'm very disappointed now.. I wish I could return, but we already assembled the table, so we have to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Was very simple to put together, and a lot nicer then I thought it would be for what I paid for it. It’s beautiful and definitely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Very cute coffee table, easy to assemnle. Arrived dirty with a HUGE crack right on the top. Reached out to manufacturer, who told me to reach out to amazon. Amazon told me to reach out to manufacturer. Endless cycle
customer_reviews.author: Jake H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: The collage wall in my entry hall was screaming for something... this was it! Sturdy, easy to assemble and all around great value.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan McC.

customer_reviews.title: Surface troubles
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and understood I wasn't spending a lot of money. But after a few weeks of owning it, it looks like I've had the table for years. The surface material they use isn't of any value or quality. I use coasters for cups and wipe it down regularly with little to no chemicals, usually a damp clamp. But the surface material is chipping and peeling off. Doesn't help the product came damaged from manufacturer or shipping company. Buyer beware, you get what you pay for. And at $100.00, I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jskehan

customer_reviews.title: Defective Piece & Slow Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever buying a coffee table and I had it set up to arrive and be built before hosting a super bowl party at my new place. After I started building the table myself, I found that one of the legs was defective and unable to have a screw put in all the way, unlike the other three legs. I reached out to customer service and it took a week to hear back about my parts replacement form being submitted, even though they say it typically takes 1-2 business days. I’m STILL waiting on the part to ship to me. This has been a poor experience overall.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and matched exactly with my bookcases I bought off Wayfair 🥰
customer_reviews.author: RegalAKK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this was going to be light and not sturdy but it was definitely more high quality than I expected. And beautiful once put together!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it! The first one arrived damaged. It took almost 5 hours to assemble by myself. Several of the holes do not line up at all. I had to drill new holes and bore out existing ones for it to fit. After it was basically forced together, I found that the holes for the cabinet doors do not line up at all. I would have to drill all new ones if I want the doors on. It’s extremely heavy and very sturdy but I would definitely not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I’ve started searching for furniture specifically from this company because of how nice their items look and how sturdy everything is. I saw a few comments regarding assembly that made me nervous, but the seller must have updated the product because I didn’t have to screw any holes and it was extremely easy to put together (maybe 45 minutes total). Fits my farmhouse theme very well and came a lot faster than was estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Celia M

customer_reviews.title: The Top is Curved- Will Not Fit In Place
customer_reviews.text: This product top is so curved that my husband and I could not get the top on- as this is more than halfway through the construction we did not discover the problem until an hour into putting this together and then proceeded to spend another 2 hours trying to figure out what was wrong. My hands became bruised and has micro cuts. My back hurt so bad that I couldn’t fall asleep. I have put together other furniture before and this was the first time I’ve ever received a defective piece so shame on the Walker Edison company for sending out products they know are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! The mixed reviews had me worried but I'm glad I decided to give it a try anyway. My husband didn't believe me when I told him how cheap it was! It is sturdy, and a great size height and length. Perfect for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn and Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: What a great find!
customer_reviews.text: The design is very simplistic but specific. The corner accents are a great touch!
customer_reviews.author: Josefina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new set up and easy to set up! 👌
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these to complement my new decor in my “living room space” off of my kitchen. I was really happy with the quality, the look and the sturdiness of these side tables. I had purchased the TV console table outside of Amazon but these are a perfect match. Loving the overall aesthetic with these side tables added - it means no one has to put drinks or food on the floor 👌🥂🍻
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFourteen

customer_reviews.title: Compartments are too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stand mainly to hold a big TV, but also a place to put Blu ray player and soundbar controller. I guess I should have read the dimensions. I like that it has a center board to help prevent warping, but because of that board all the storage space cubes are small. None of my other electronics that go to the TV fit in the spaces. The color is nice and it seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: R McClinton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My biggest gripe about this piece is that I was missing some of the required screws to assemble and ended up having to go to my nearest hardware store to get some. I have the rest of this set for my living room and I think its good quality, the end tables are a little wobbly but this may just be because i didn't have the proper things to assemble, but would take this into consideration before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our small living room
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of this side table. Works perfectly for our small living room, and matches a lot of our decor/hardware throughout the house. Sturdy and thick, but not too heavy. I bought a cloth basket set that matches the color theme for my dogs toys and it fits great on the bottom shelf. Would love to get the matching entry table.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I love the color. I got 2 of them and they are so cute and look good in my living room. I love the set in the living room. I also have the desk, bookcase and coffee table. They look good together, They are very easy to put together. I would tell anyone to get this to because they look good
customer_reviews.author: Jules Rules

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but wood is weak to hold screws....
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice & matches our other table very well but the wood is CHEAPLY made!!! My husband put it together & screamed, "F***! Threw the pieces down at 1 point... when you're screwing the screws in, the wood strips & then you have to create another hole for the screw & the legs aren't that wide so luckily, we got it put together & will keep for now... just wish the manufacturer would've sprung for a stronger wood. Meh. Maybe we'll go more expensive next time.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. It was so easy to assemble I did it in less than 20 minutes. Very sturdy I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice once assembled. It took about 30 minutes to assemble and directions were easy to follow. It's decent quality. I don't anticipate this to last 20 years, but given the price, it's a good value. It meets my expectations and looks nicer in person than online.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2008TX

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love my TV stand and coffee table. Took us about 3 hours to assemblethe tv stand and about 1 hour for me to assemble the coffee table alone. Can be pretty tricky to attach pieces so be very patient. One of my panels for my tv stand that goes on the middle came a little broken which bummed me out but the good thing is that it is not noticeable since the doors cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t spill liquids or use cleaning spray!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice. Really easy to put together. BUT there is no protective top coat. Sprayed it to wash and the cleaner sinks in.... spilled a drink and it bubbles and now just looks old and used. Really loved the color and style of this set but would recommend getting a good top coat immediately after setting it up or you’ll be buying a new one like me 😭
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Hiett

customer_reviews.title: Grab hot cocoa and blanket
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have no complaints. I bought this for my office/den since my space is so small. I haven't turned the heater on yet but plan on using during my morning coffee and pre-work time. Assembly was easy just be sure to match the numbers to the picture diagram bc the pieces won't fit right.
customer_reviews.author: crabby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and not too hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our living room. Arrived well packed. All parts and prices accounted for and my husband was able to put it all together in under an hour. He’s pretty handy. Good quality and looks like the pictures shown.
customer_reviews.author: JKATX

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for smaller home
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, husband assembled in under 30 minutes and matches my living room perfectly. Missing 1 star for the price - I would say because of the size it’s worth more like $80 max. But I’m keeping it because I have a small apartment, no room for a huge side table.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful! I received so many compliments. I knocked off a star for assembly only because the end product hides all the small nails/screws (for a clean, almost seamless type look) so it can be a little tricky to assemble at first. It is VERY sturdy and the shelf is more spacious than I thought. Be cautious that the parts are heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Gab’sGlasses

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Coffee Table!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered both a coffee table and a TV stand from them and I've been impressed with both! The coffee table was simple to put together - I did it by myself and only needed a screwdriver. It's sturdy and looks great as a simple but elegant piece in our living room. It's a great size, and I like that there's a bottom piece so I can put baskets or books on the lower shelf if needed. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bookcase, however the price point does not match the quality you get. It was disappointing. I bought many pieces to this collection and thought the price was fair....until I saw the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Received today. It was easy to put together. It was the perfect size to fill the space. Looks and feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela C

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, quality is not
customer_reviews.text: The table looks awesome but the parts and the board are very cheap. In the box had pieces of wood to keep the table pieces from moving, it was made from the same material. Luckily they were only there to stop the pieces from moving but it is clearly made of particle board. This table shouldn't be more than $75 i am really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ck burke

customer_reviews.title: A Great table for living room
customer_reviews.text: I really like the table. The assembly took me about an hour or two ( fast compared to another furnitures ) I have been with the table for 4 months, it doesn’t scratch quickly, it’s easy to clean, it does not absorb stains. The size is great for my living room, and the color is great.
customer_reviews.author: BARAK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table
customer_reviews.text: We downsized our coffee table to this one at first I thought it was to small. But after having it for a month or so now we love it. It’s perfect fit with our oversized couch. It is very sturdy our 35 pound toddler climbs and sits on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were easy to follow and item went together quickly and without issue. My only complaint is - why are these pre-fab furniture items so darned expensive?? Overall though I am pleased with the look and quality of this accent table :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Top warped
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is very flattering and very pretty. It was easy to assemble until putting the top on. It was warped so much, I had to buy my own hardware to make it flat. There was such a gap between the top piece and the rest of the TV stand. I do not recommend this TV stand to anyone and I am VERY disappointed in this buy. Def not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assmeble
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece and so easy to put together, took me 30 min to assemble. Goes well with the coffee table we have.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Curved top, bowed wood.
customer_reviews.text: The top piece is bowed and the holes won’t line up. There’s a curve to it. I’ve called the company and they can’t send out another piece. Amazon says I can disassemble the whole thing and ship it back. It’s not light, nor small. Customer service from the company should just send out the correct top piece that isn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size table for our 3 season porch - goes well with the decor and works as a serving table when we have parties. It isn't wobbly at all and can handle the reasonable weight when it is loaded down with dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in MN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece - worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for as an entryway table. The color is perfect and fairly easy to assemble with two people. Well worth the money. There was however a scratch on the side on one of the planks so inspect it before building.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, not the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the matching end table and this coffee table to match our tv stand. Unfortunately the quality of this table just did not match up. Following instructions to the T and the wood still split on two of the legs! Heres hoping it lasts long enough to get our moneys worth out of it.
customer_reviews.author: beautifullyderangedmommy

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money on this, I've had this for about 4 months and the edges are peeling away like a soft paper. Im so disappointed that I even spent 200 on this
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Haley

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy furniture
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my living room tables and these are perfect. They are not too big or too small. The size keeps me from clogging my table with all kinds of paper and things, but I have the lower portion to place decorative items. I just need one more to complete my set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hardware and the predrilled holes dont fit at all. To small holes for larger screws. My table is wobbly because it doesnt fit correctly . The sticker is peaking off of the table. I really like the color and style . I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Freese

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table about two months ago, and had no complaints until yesterday. I went to clean the table with all purpose cleaner and it removed the top finish off the coffee table and resulted in dark spots of residue on the table (see photo). For the price I paid for this table, I would expect a more quality product with a protective varnish that would not stain from the use of everyday cleaners. I would not recommend this product for anyone expecting it to withstand typical usage.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It was easy to assemble and took about an hour. It was everything I envisioned!
customer_reviews.author: ttownes

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful addition to the TV stand
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely charmed by the TV stand that I bought so I had to buy the coffee table to go with it and I couldn’t be happier :) Assemble is easy, very stable and the color is Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful end tables, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these end tables and they arrived on time as described. They add a great look to our living room, are unique in style, and are very sturdy/stable. Easy to assemble - very pleased with the product - totally worth the $$!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Argen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but use a drill!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 tables and had them both assembled in less than an hour. One thing, the instructions say to use a screwdriver and not a drill, but we used a drill. The holes predrilled by the manufacturer are not drilled out completely so it was easier to use a drill. Tables are nice and sturdy and we like them. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Maydon

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am completely disappointed. The first time I purchased this product I put it together and the too piece was too small for the base, so I returned it and got another one. This one the top was again too small and it isn't balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Short

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this coffee table. Not only is it great for the price, but it was so easy to assemble. It matches perfectly with other shades of brown, as well as the matching pieces. Definitely a great addition to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great end table.
customer_reviews.text: I love this end table. I got the matching end table, coffee table, and tv stand. I love how they look and everything is relatively sturdy. Definitely worth the price. It was super easy to set up and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Quality is garbage. Very disappointed that a trusted name like amazon would allow its customers to be lured into purchasing such junk. I would rather by second hand for a fraction of the cost I'd I knew how poorly made this table was. We bought a matching end table which was even worse. I ate the 100 bucks and put it in the garage to rot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend buying this product, the quality is well below my expectations considering the price. The pilot holes were not drilled tp fit the screws they provide so you either strip the screws completely or have to re-dill the holes yourself. This piece of junk is not worth $25.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not the color as pictured, but still nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the color pictured, but I do like it a lot. It had some scratches and chips upon arrival, but I do think it’s cute and perfect to warm up the space. Was tedious to put together, but we like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :-(
customer_reviews.text: These tables, once assembled, look cheap to me. I haven't replaced them yet, but I will soon. They're smaller than I expected (my fault -- should have really paid attention to the dimensions), and just look cheap. Definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne106

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great looking! but kind of spendy but you pay for quality You have to look at the end tables they are beautiful also. The packaging is flawless great job guys.
customer_reviews.author: chopper54

customer_reviews.title: Boards bowed
customer_reviews.text: Both of the other reviews said it all. Looks great but boards are bowed and I needed extra manpower to bend the top board into place so all the dowels and holes lined up.
customer_reviews.author: Ski1976

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TABLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this table. True description. Color was a little darker than expected but still matched perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: Quinco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Entry Table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! Took about 45 minutes to assemble. I was a bit disappointed as soon as it was assembled we noticed there was a small scuff on the table top. Contacted Amazon and they took care of it!
customer_reviews.author: elvache

customer_reviews.title: Get a power drill to be safe
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so the tables themselves once assembled look great, very sturdy, heavy, decent quality. However, assembling them was a nightmare. I bought two, and for one of the two, we were given screws of an incorrect size. If we had a power drill, it would be no big deal, but we do not. It took 3x the amount of time to assemble because we ended up using nails to hammer them in. The other table had the right size, but still hard to screw in. GET/USE A POWER DRILL! The assembly is literally my only complaint. I’m going to go order a drill now.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great table. The shelves are a little on the heavier side which I like, not flimsy particle board like most you would find for this price. Goes perfect with our “farmhouse” theme
customer_reviews.author: Shelton

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am so happy that I bought it! Quality furniture and a reasonable cost. Easy to assemble per my husband. So fun to decorate for each holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Better have a drill on stand by
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put together, the pre made holes were not really pre made, had the find a drill to get it together. Over all, looks great amd matching perfect. Had a few damaged spot, but both were on the bottom piece and you can not see it, but for 100 bucks. Im happy.

customer_reviews.title: Not Pure White
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the color. Description states white but it didn't look white in the picture. This is NOT a pure white. It is more of a yellowed/antiqued/off white. It does match match our other Off White furniture good enough to not stand out. Nice design, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: The worst quality in the market
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I have ever bought, I bought it 2 months ago and it's falling apart already. The quality is very bad and the part don't even fit the table. Please don't buy this product you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Madelca Cruz

customer_reviews.title: STONE GREY-WALKER EDISON
customer_reviews.text: The table assemble process was not difficult but there are some hard to reach spots-small holes with screws. I ordered the stone grey coffee table. The coffee table is the perfect size for my living room and I do recommend the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy farmhouse table.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness and simplicity of this table. Very farmhouse. I left off the side slats that make the crosses because I just wanted it siimple.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie L. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged parts
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this item! It did not come on time and it has a huge crack in the front where everyone will see it (meaning not on the back) I cannot return due to it is too heavy for me to move 😕 I wish I would have canceled the second time they sent me a delayed notice for shipment. Love the color and style in the picture however extremely disappointed that this cracked TV stand will be in my family room with our 75" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Love the look it adds to my livingroom and how it complements the other furniture. I'm also pleased with the sturdiness of this piece.
customer_reviews.author: YMHAWK

product_meta.title: Walker Edison Furniture Company Barnwood Farmhouse Wood Rectangle Accent Entryway Table Sideboard Living Room Storage Shelf, 46 Inch, Stone Grey
product_meta.description: With this entry table, you’ll have a stylish entryway in no time. The urban industrial and charming, farmhouse style create a warm and inviting feel to your home, you’ll enjoy having. With metal accents on the corners and x-shaped sides for an intriguing design. A lower shelving made from durable laminate, provides a surface for your shoes when you get home or to decorate.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 30" H x 46" L x 14" W
Made with black painted metal legs and accents with a durable laminate table top
Can be used as an entry table, sofa table, or computer desk
Corner metal details create accents to the piece

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
